abstract: Brit naval circles silent on German claim of 1 cruiser, 1 destroyer and 5 transports sunk off Namsos
snippet: LONDON, May 1--An unconfirmed report carried by The Exchange Telegraph Agency from Goeteborg, Sweden, said Allied forces in Norway were advancing southward on the Steinkjer front, north of Trondheim....

headline.main: NAMSOS ADVANCE BY ALLIES CLAIMED; London Hears of Move Toward Steinkjer--Nazis Report 13 Ships Hit Off Port

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 1--An unconfirmed report carried by The Exchange Telegraph Agency from Goeteborg, Sweden, said Allied forces in Norway were advancing southward on the Steinkjer front, north of Trondheim.
